summary: The diff successfully implements the requested welcome message change. The hero section in ProductCatalog.tsx now displays 'WELCOME TO OM FANCY & GIFT COLLECTION' instead of the old text, with enhanced styling including gradient effects. The text maintains prominence through large font sizes (text-5xl md:text-7xl) and gradient styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new collection badge with Sparkles icon and 'New Collection Available' text above the welcome heading
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to change the welcome text, not to add new UI elements like badges or icons

hallucinated_features.description: Added descriptive subtitle text 'Discover our curated collection of premium products designed for modern living'
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request any additional descriptive text below the welcome heading

hallucinated_features.description: Redesigned hero banner with gradient overlays, background image, and enhanced visual effects
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only specified changing the text content while maintaining the same styling and prominence, not a complete hero section redesign
